description: Working on the documents team to deliver dynamically created legal documents for multiple markets across several different continents
Deprecated old services and moved functionality to smaller microservices cutting down document generation by several factors and improving user experience significantly
Created an internal testing tool that moved support engineers away from manual testing to automated testing
Technologies Used: gRPC, GraphQL, Golang, Terraform, Flask, FastAPI, Python, AWS ECS, Secrets Manager, S3, Docker
Working with different government and commercial clients on different software projects
Client: NASA, Project Title: Agency Level Portal Service (ALPS)
Implemented a centralized, cloud-native, scalable, Agency-wide Library web portal that saved NASA billions of dollars by reducing redundancy across NASA sites
Technologies Used: Wagtail (Django-based CMS), Python, AWS, Docker
Technologies Used: Pyramid, Python, AWS S3, RDS, EC2, SSM, Docker
